summary: This is an internal FBI email summarizing a meeting between the SDNY Chief, Geoffrey Berman, and an attorney for Epstein's co-conspirator. The meeting was unproductive, ending with an agreement for the attorneys to submit a written position, after which the agencies would meet to solidify their stance.

persons.name: J. S.
persons.context: Author of the email, reporting on a meeting regarding Epstein's co-conspirator.

persons.name: Geoff Berman
persons.context: Met with an attorney for Epstein's co-conspirator; the meeting was described as largely unproductive.

connections.description: Berman is the SDNY Chief being reported on by FBI Agent J. S. regarding a meeting with an attorney for Epstein's co-conspirator.

events.title: Meeting on Epstein Co-conspirator
events.description: A meeting between SDNY Chief Geoff Berman and an attorney for Epstein's co-conspirator took place and was reported as largely unproductive. It concluded with an agreement for the attorneys to submit a written position.

keyFacts: A meeting occurred between SDNY Chief Geoff Berman and an attorney for Jeffrey Epstein's co-conspirator.
The meeting was described as 'largely unproductive'.
The outcome was an agreement for the attorneys to send a written submission to the SDNY regarding their position.
After receiving the written submission, the agencies planned to meet again to solidify their joint position moving forward.
